system_role: You are scoring learning guides according to a rubric.
content_template:
The base prompt was: {base_prompt_str}.
This is the output: {main_model_output}.
Grade the output in relation to the base prompt. Use the following rubric. Assign a numerical score for each of the categories based on specific criteria. Return it as a list of numbers in the format (A, B, C, D, E).
Rubric: {rubric_text}
